dcterms:creator: Martijn Schreuder
Thomas Rost
Michael Tangermann
dcterms:description: The AMUSE dataset is based on auditory stimulus elicited by means of spatially located speakers, performed on healthy subjects.
dcterms:title: AMUSE

F Aloise

dcterms:description: The P300 Speller dataset is based on the classical P300 Speller paradigm, performed on healthy subjects.
dcterms:title: P300 Speller

dcterms:creator: Angela Riccio
Luca Simione
Francesca Schettini
Alessia Pizzimenti
Maurizio Inghilleri
Marta Olivetti Belardinelli
Donatella Mattia

dcterms:description: The ALS P300 Speller dataset is based on the classical P300 Speller paradigm, performed on patients suffering from Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS).
dcterms:title: ALS P300 Speller

dcterms:creator: Sulamith Schaeff
Matthias Sebastian Treder
Bastian Venthur
Benjamin Blankertz
dcterms:description: The MVEP dataset is a visual protocol in which a moving pattern generates a movement-onset visual evoked potential used to recognize the user’s choice.
dcterms:title: MVEP

dcterms:creator: Matthias Sebastian Treder
Nico Maurice Schmidt
Benjamin Blankertz
dcterms:description: The Center Speller dataset is a visual protocol where visual stimuli are elicited by means of three different stimuli, performed on healthy subjects.
dcterms:title: Center Speller

dcterms:creator: Claudia Ledesma-Ramirez
Erik Bojorges-Valdez
Oscar Yáñez-Suarez
Carolina Saavedra
Laurent Bougrain
Gerardo Gabriel Gentiletti
dcterms:description: The Akimpech dataset is a P300 Speller performed on healthy subjects, with 16 characters and 15 iterations for each character in the calibration phase.
dcterms:title: Akimpech
